mapper.select: select ID as id, CATEGORY as category, TITLE as title, YEAR as year, MONTH_1 as month_1, MONTH_2 as month_2, MONTH_3 as month_3, MONTH_4 as month_4, MONTH_5 as month_5, MONTH_6 as month_6, MONTH_7 as month_7, MONTH_8 as month_8, MONTH_9 as month_9, MONTH_10 as month_10, MONTH_11 as month_11, MONTH_12 as month_12 from CALENDAR where year in (#{year});
